name: video-call-reactions
title: Video Call Reactions
description: This extension triggers video call reactions such as hearts, thumbs up/down, balloons, rain, confetti, fireworks, and lasers on macOS.
author: yazan_zaid

commands.name: index
commands.title: Trigger Video Reaction
commands.subtitle: Choose and trigger video call reactions with ease.
commands.description: The script allows users to select and trigger reactions like confetti and fireworks during a video call.

preferences.name: defaultReaction
preferences.title: Default Reaction
preferences.description: Choose the default reaction for video calls.

preferences.name: showConfetti
preferences.title: Show Confetti 🎉
preferences.description: Confetti in Raycast to celebrate after you choose the Confetti 🎉 reaction, regardless of whether it activates during the video call.
preferences.label: Show Confetti

preferences.name: playSound
preferences.title: Play Sound on Confetti
preferences.description: Play a sound effect when confetti is shown.
preferences.label: Play Sound
